Chinese high-ranking military delegation to visit DPRK 
    Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- A high-ranking military delegation of the People's Republic of China headed by Chi Haotian, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the PRC who is State Councilor and Minister of National Defence, will soon visit the DPRK.

U.S. Secretary of State to visit DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Secretary of State to visit DPRK 
    Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- U.S. Secretary of State Madeleine K. Albright will soon visit the DPRK to directly convey President William Clinton's views on the improvement of the DPRK-U.S. relations to Chairman Kim Jong Il of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and prepare for a visit by the President of the United States.
